footer.headline: Ready for an identity with a bilingual heartbeat?
footer.description: Brand strategy, visual identity, and performant websites for ambitious teams across the globe.

intro.title: SHE BUILDS. SHE DESIGNS. SHE CREATES.
intro.subtitle: Bridging The Gap Between Engineering Logic, Visual Aesthetics, And Motion.

philosophy.title: In the tech world, people are often labeled as either 'thinkers' or 'artists.' I've never fit neatly into just one box.
philosophy.description: To me, Coding and Design are not separate disciplines—they are two sides of the same coin. A beautiful interface fails without robust architecture, and clean code is wasted on a poor user experience. I have dedicated my career to mastering both equally, ensuring that what sits under the hood is just as polished as the pixels on the screen.

journey.title: It started six years ago with small content projects in my hometown.
journey.description: eventually leading to my first professional Corporate job at Saediniq. While my role there focused on Graphic Design, I quickly realized I thrived at the intersection of creativity and logic. I didn't just want to design the surface; I wanted to build the engine

current.title: Today, as a Freelance Full-Stack Developer, I refuse to separate Form from Function.
current.description: I engineer scalable, high-performance code while simultaneously crafting intuitive designs, ensuring the underlying logic is just as elegant as the interface the user sees.

toolkit.title: My Toolkit
toolkit.skills: Graphic Design • Full-Stack Development • UI/UX Design • Video Production

cta.text: I am currently open to collaborating with teams who value this multidisciplinary mindset.

home.title: Fateme Ahmadi — Brand Identity & Web Design
